alert.note: Alert for St. Charles (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 26 at 8:45PM CDT until September 26 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN ST. CHARLES COUNTY... At 845 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Lake St. Louis, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... O`Fallon, Wentzville, Lake St. Louis, Dardenne Prairie, St. Paul, New Melle, Josephville, and Flint Hill. This includes Interstate 70 in Missouri between exits 208 and 216. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
